item.title: Scraping wine colours with R
item.description: My knowledge of wine covers three facts: I like red wine. I do not like white wine. I love wine data. I came across a great collection of around 130,000 wine reviews, each a paragraph long, on Kaggle. This is juicy stuff, and I canâ€™t wait to dig into it with some text analysis, or maybe build some sort of markov chain or neural network that generates new wine reviews.
